title: FS: SOLD Beautiful Postcard Niagara University1907 SGC Freshly Graded
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: SOLD Beautiful Postcard Niagara University1907 SGC Freshly Graded
posts.post_content:
Niagara university postcard is sharp-the grade is obviously due to the pc being postally used, but that's what i like about it. I am working on aquiring another card that's the reason i'm selling it. I would like to get SOLD for it. Thanks.

Joe k
